tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We would really suggest that if you wish to enjoy your pregnancy period and remain informed professionally through out this wonderful experience then Dr. Yashica is the one you need. I had a multiple fibroid pregnancy which is considered as high risk, and had no idea earlier of such risk before conceiving. 
I must say, the confidence Dr. Yashica gave us was the best thing. She explained extensively about all aspects, showed great confidence that it will be all good, did not impose a do’s and don’ts list on us. She ensured that we enjoy this beautiful experience.
My heartiest thanks to her for getting me deliver safely with a healthy baby. May this comment helps other would be moms to have wonderful experiences.
Thanks to practo users, whose comments helped us to reach Dr. Yashica.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
***** ** ** *** ******* ** *** **** ******* * ********* ***********
I had my first appointment in March and in her clinic in April and I had to wait more than 1.5 hours. Today is July 5th and they cancelled my appointment for the 3rd time and I couldn’t meet her after April 1st. 
*** **** ******** thing is that she cancels her appointments frequently and doesn’t care about patient’s work and leave from their workplace.
I needed urgent treatment but she doesn’t care.****** **** ****** **** ***** ********* ***** *** ***** ***** ****** ****** *** *** ** *** ********* *** ***** Doctor Yashica and her staff don’t value the time, health and concern of patients. 

** *** **** ****** *** ******* ********* ** *** ** ** ****** ******* *******

tags: Wait time,
review:
This doctor might be good in providing treatment but I would not advice anyone to visit her clinic. The clinic is run very unprofessionally. First time I had booked an appointment with the doctor, she arrived 1.5 hour late in the clinic itself.
I though it might be one of the instances but the second time I booked the appointment, I got a call on the day of appointment to cancel it and reschedule it for next day, I agreed. Next day they called me and requested me to come 30 mins late from the appointment time. I agreed. When I had already left home they called at that time and said doctor is not available today.
They have no value for other’s time. The staff in unprofessional they are unable to handle  customers.
The doctor treatment has no problem but it’s only worth if you have ample of time to devote just to wait for the doctor.

Consult with her, you won't regret I bet!!

review: I visited for my wife, Anshika Mishra*** ** *** ** *** ****** *** ******** ******** * **** **** ** ***. She has an eye for detail. Her approach is simply based on prevention is much better than cure. She has assisted us for any concerns whatsoever we had with best possible solutions. .

review: I started visiting Doctor at Mother’s care starting 2nd Jan 2020 for my pregnancy . I had 2 miscarriages and reason unknown so for my healthy pregnancy started consulting Doctor Yashica. She is very experienced. She guides in a very systematic way with multiple tests done so the treatment is successful. Now I am blessed with a baby girl. Thank you Doctor for all the guidance and encouragement. We had full faith in your treatment and we have been blessed with a healthy baby girl.

She doesn’t exaggerates, makes you feel comfortable, she is soft spoken, you will definitely satisfy with the treatment..
5 stars
